title: Valorant mobile
author: Riot Games
description: Valorant Mobile brings the iconic 5v5 tactical shooter to your phone.
longDesc: Valorant Mobile brings the iconic 5v5 tactical shooter to your phone. Master precise gunplay, unleash unique Agent abilities, and dominate every match on the go.

title: Ride 5 mobile
author: Milestone
description: Ride 5 mobile Riders republic mobile Rooftops & alleys Beamng drive mobile Rematch mobile
longDesc: Take control of the fastest superbikes and race across challenging tracks in Ride 5 Mobile. Experience ultra-realistic physics, thrilling competitions, and become the ultimate champion on two wheels—anytime, anywhere.

title: Sifu mobile
author: Sloclap
description: Kung-fu combat with skill, precision, and revenge.
longDesc: Embark on a journey of revenge where every fight sharpens your kung-fu mastery in a stylish, action-packed world.

title: Rooftops & alleys
author: MLMEDIA
description: Dynamic parkour action across rooftops and hidden alleys.
longDesc: Run, jump, and parkour through the urban jungle in Rooftops & Alleys Mobile. Master wall-runs, flips, and daring stunts as you explore the rooftops of a vibrant city full of challenges.

title: Beamng drive mobile
author: BeamNG
description: Realistic driving and crash physics in open environments.
longDesc: Experience the most realistic driving simulation ever brought to mobile. In BeamNG Drive Mobile, crash, drift, and test vehicles with true-to-life soft-body physics in open-world environments.

title: Rematch mobile
author: Sloclap
description: Fast-paced competitive battles built for instant rematches.
longDesc: Step into the arena with Rematch Mobile—an action-packed competitive fighter. Test your skills in fast-paced duels, challenge friends worldwide, and prove you’re the true champion.

title: The Last of Us 2 Mobile
author: Naughty Dog
description: Emotional post-apocalyptic adventure with stealth and survival elements.
longDesc: Survive in a post-apocalyptic world with Ellie in this emotional and action-packed adventure game adapted for mobile.

title: Ghost of Tsushima Mobile
author: Sucker Punch
description: Explore feudal Japan with samurai combat and stunning landscapes.
longDesc: Experience the journey of a samurai defending Tsushima island in this stunning open-world mobile adaptation.

title: Assassin’s Creed Mirage Mobile
author: Ubisoft
description: Classic stealth adventure set in vibrant historical Baghdad streets.
longDesc: Step into the shadows of Baghdad and become a master assassin in this action-adventure mobile version of Mirage.

title: Inside Mobile
author: Playdead
description: Dark atmospheric puzzle platformer with haunting story and visuals.
longDesc: Immerse yourself in a dark and atmospheric puzzle-platformer with stunning visuals and emotional storytelling.

title: Red Dead Redemption 2 Mobile
author: Rockstar Games
description: Epic western story-driven game with vast open-world exploration.
longDesc: Explore the vast Wild West as Arthur Morgan in this rich narrative-driven mobile experience.

title: God of War Mobile
author: Santa Monica Studio
description: Mythology-based action game with brutal combat and epic boss fights.
longDesc: Join Kratos and Atreus in their mythological journey through Norse realms in this epic mobile adaptation.

title: Watch Dogs 2 Mobile
author: Ubisoft
description: Open-world hacking game with missions, exploration, and stealth.
longDesc: Hack the city as Marcus Holloway and take down a corrupt system in this open-world mobile game.

title: Dragon Ball FighterZ Mobile
author: Arc System Works
description: Fast-paced fighting game with iconic Dragon Ball characters.
longDesc: Experience fast-paced anime battles with your favorite Dragon Ball characters on mobile.

title: Attack on Titan 2 Mobile
author: Omega Force
description: Fight massive Titans with maneuver gear in intense battles.
longDesc: Fight titans and defend humanity in this intense action RPG based on the popular anime.

title: Naruto Ultimate Ninja Storm 4
author: CyberConnect2
description: Epic ninja battles with cinematic moves and story mode.
longDesc: Battle with legendary ninja in epic story and versus modes in this action-packed fighting game.

title: GTA 5 Mobile
author: Rockstar Games
description: Open-world crime, missions, and multiplayer chaos on mobile.
longDesc: Dive into the open world of Los Santos with missions, chaos, and endless exploration.

title: Minecraft
author: Mojang Studios
description: Build, explore, and survive in endless blocky worlds.
longDesc: Create, survive, and explore endless worlds in the iconic sandbox game now on mobile.

title: Cuphead Mobile
author: Studio MDHR
description: Classic run and gun with vintage cartoon art style.
longDesc: Dodge bullets and battle bosses in this hand-drawn, vintage-style platformer shooter.

title: Spider-Man 2 Mobile
author: Insomniac Games
description: Web-slinging adventure with fluid combat and open-world NYC.
longDesc: Swing through New York and face iconic villains in this thrilling superhero mobile game.

title: Counter-Strike 2 Mobile
author: Valve
description: Competitive tactical shooter with team-based objectives.
longDesc: Experience tactical multiplayer combat in the mobile edition of this iconic FPS franchise.

title: Jump Force
author: Spike Chunsoft
description: Fighting game featuring popular manga heroes in epic battles.
longDesc: Fight alongside anime legends from DBZ, Naruto, One Piece, and more in epic 3D battles.

title: Elite auto brasil Mod
author: Solty Games
description: Car game with Brazilian streets and mods.
longDesc: Car game with Brazilian streets and mods.

title: Hollow knghith silksong
author: Team Cherry
description: A popular game with a dark, beautiful world featuring exploration and challenges.
longDesc: Embark on a journey of revenge where every fight sharpens your kung-fu mastery in a stylish, action-packed world.

title: Rocket league mobile
author: Epic Games
description: A mobile version of the popular Rocket League game.
longDesc: Online car football matches.

title: One piece mugen
author: Spike trolor
description: A fighting game likely featuring characters from the One Piece anime using the MUGEN engine.
longDesc: A fighting game likely featuring characters from the One Piece anime using the MUGEN engine.

title: One piece fighting path
author: Nuverse Games
description: A fighting game likely featuring characters from the One Piece anime using the MUGEN engine.
longDesc: A game possibly focusing on battles and fights from the One Piece universe.

title: Getway 2
author: Miniclip
description: Probably a mod adding extra content to a racing game.
longDesc: Probably a mod adding extra content to a racing game.

title: Mini soccer star Mod
author: Viva Games
description: A sequel or expansion to Hollow Knight.
longDesc: A sequel or expansion to Hollow Knight.

title: Kimetsu noy aiba thc 2
author: CyberConnect2
description: Could be a fighting or action game inspired by the Demon Slayer series.
longDesc: Could be a fighting or action game inspired by the Demon Slayer series.

title: Forza Horizon 5 Mobile
author: Playground Games
description: Stunning open-world racing with hundreds of cars and events.
longDesc: Race across stunning open roads and exotic locations in the mobile edition of Forza Horizon 5.
